pullRequest.title: Fix NPE when deleting multiple services
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add new app configuration for max number of threads for service
processing. Refactor CheckForOperationsInProgressStep to decouple it a
little more from CheckServicesToDeleteStep. Implement parallel calls to
CC for getting service instances as these calls might take up to 1
minute when there are a lot of services in the space. Utilize
ForkJoinPoolUtil so that thread number can be specified.
JIRA: LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-2217

nodes.bodyText:
Instead of using a pair like this, I suggest to create the map of services to service operations first, then do
map.values().removeIf(this::isServiceOperationInProgress)
This will delete the entry for which the predicate returns true

commit.message:
Remove redundant call to CC for service operation status

JIRA: LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-2217

nodes.bodyText:
This is intended, as I want to merge the data from both the cached service object and the one coming from CC.
The cached one is CloudServiceInstanceExtended and might have additional information than the one returned from CC (which is only CloudServiceInstance).

The function should be called getExistingServicesInProgress
because it returns multiple services
Won't the data from service be overwritten with the data from existingService?
Either this name or doGetExistingServicesInProgress. Both are good but since the name is already long, why make it longer :D
